entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -37.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 06:37 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

Temperature: -37.1°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -41.0°C
Wind: NNW 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Clear. High minus 38.
